insert into user ( USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_ROLE, USER_GROUP, USER_AUTH_YN, USER_ADR
) select concat( 'U', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m'), lpad((max(IFNULL(substr(user_id,8,4), '0')) +1), 4, '0') ) AS user_id, #{user_email}, #{user_nm}, #{user_pw}, #{user_role}, #{user_group}, #{user_auth_yn}, #{user_adr} from user where user_id like 'U'||DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m')
